# format

**Instance Property**

The format used to create the associated graphics renderer.

## Declaration

```swift
var format: UIGraphicsRendererFormat { get }
```

## Discussion

If you specified a format object when you initialized the current renderer ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRenderer]) object, then this property provides access to that object. Otherwise, a default format object was created for you using the renderer initialization parameters, tuned to the current device.

## Getting the drawing context

- **cgContext**: The underlying Core Graphics context.
